How many seasons exist of this anime?

Two Seasons of this anime exist along with a "3rd season" that is an incomplete OVA.
The first season is called:
"Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni" and is referred to as the "Question Arcs".
The Second Season is called:
"Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Kai" and is referred to as the "Answer Arcs".
The Third Season is called:
"Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Rei" and is not referred to by any special title.
The Third Season, as stated before, is an OVA. Original Video Art and has no official connection to the previous two Seasons. However, OVA's are some times made by the creators and thus act as an unofficial "follow up" on the series.
i do not know if that is the case here.
i hope this information was helpful.
